name: Retrovirus (itch)
description:
This game was originally created to test both a graphics library (see how many people had trouble running OpenGL games) and a control scheme (how do people handle keyboard and mouse simultaneously?).  As such, it is not a huge, deep experience.  It's fun to blast away for a while, but I confess there is not much to it. It's got cute effects, though!

* Nothing much to it

* A virus with an afro and gold chain

* Shoot a lot!

* You can slow time and fire panic bombs too, if you don't mind losing points
